subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Perhaps related to {{och-l|槎|to cut trees}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Compare also {{cog|km|ឈើ||wood}} ([[ibid.]]).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[faggot]]; [[bundle]] of [[stick]]s bound together (as [[fuel]])
# [[firewood]]; [[brushwood]]; [[wood]]
# {{†}} to [[burn]] [[firewood]] and [[worship]] [[heaven]]
# {{†}} [[fuzz]] [[stick]]; [[old]] wood
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[bony]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal}} [[lean]]; [[hard]] to [[chew]]
# {{lb|zh|Min}} [[slow]] and [[inarticulate]]; [[dull]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
